page.title: 15HEALTH AROUND POOL FARM
page.content: Health is a very important part of our life.The handicapped people around here have no place where they can meet,go on day trips or just talk to each other. There are not enough {health visitors} around {Pool Farm} to check up on the people who have children but do not take care of them.DaveÂ£s Health Factory is a very good place where people can enjoy getting healthy and keep that way.Dave tells you what to do if you are if you are suffering from something but want to do something about it.Hayf- ever sufferes are not helped because around Pool Farm there are too many fi- elds and bits of grass.When it gets cut then that is when the people suffer.The clinic in Pool Farm provides a useful service for the many families on the estate.It is good because it is near to many homes.By children of St.Pauls School.
